name: Death Island - Dynamic Modular Arena
description:
Stadia/EGS Name: Death Island Map

Package Name: Death Island – Dynamic Modular Arena

Package Forum Link: https://forum.crayta.com/t/treasure-hunt-death-island-dynamic-modular-arena/2782... 

Package Description: A group of modular terrain blocks you can mix and match in any order. Write a script to dynamically randomize the content blocks for a new arena every game load. Modify the island theme to your game theme. Or just manually stitch together the terrain blocks for a static terrain!

Share link (Example Map): https://launch.crayta.com/play/b54rycfe

Installation instructions: Drag templates (Death Island – Terrain Block 01, Death Island Terrain Block 02, etc) into the viewport to modify the level blocks.

To create a new terrain block, start by dragging in the Death Island – Terrain Template template. The markers on all 4 sides will indicate the minimum pathable area recommended so that no blocks get cut off.
